events.message: The policyholder has reported an auto accident involving their vehicle hitting a tree on a rainy day.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the keywords related to vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle this auto accident case promptly.
The insurer sent an acknowledgement message confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
The claims agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report for further assessment.
The policyholder submitted all requested documents, including accident photos and the official police report.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and accident details for claim validation.
The investigation concluded with a full assessment of vehicle damage and confirmation of policy coverage.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the vehicle repair costs based on the investigation findings.
The policyholder responded positively expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount.
The claim approval was finalized, enabling the next steps towards payment issuance.
Payment was successfully transferred to the policyholderâ€™s account to cover the approved repair expenses.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that all processes and payments were completed.
All records and documentation pertaining to the auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference.
